ISSUE.TITLE: cannot post query for upcoming launches
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: posting data on this url ``` https://api.spacexdata.com/v4/launches/query``` with data ``` { "query": { "upcoming": true }, "options": { "limit": 1, "select": { "name": 1, "id": 1, "date_local": 1, "flight_number": 1, "details": 1, "links": 1, "date_precision": 1 }, "sort": { "flight_number": "asc" }, "populate": [ { "path": "launchpad", "select": { "name": 1, "full_name": 1 } }, { "path": "rocket", "select": { "name": 1, "id": 1 } } ] } } ``` Getting response **Cannot read property 'map' of undefined** **it was working few hours before the issue was raised, plz try to solve it fast as possible**

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #856 handle situations where users might hide the crew field
